data.name: Side Effect
data.detailed_description:
Nature has been polluted with garbage created by mankind for many long years. In this first person exploration game you will discover how pollution started and how it can be stopped one garbage at a time. Land and water are littered by used plastic, paper and glass products while air consists of very dense smog.

Features:
  • Collect and recycle litter from the environment
  • Make friends with various types of animals and get to know their individual stories
  • Let your new animal friends help you with the nature cleanup
  • Discover hidden stories about how pollution started
  • Help nature and its animals survive this garbage apocalypse
data.about_the_game:
Nature has been polluted with garbage created by mankind for many long years. In this first person exploration game you will discover how pollution started and how it can be stopped one garbage at a time. Land and water are littered by used plastic, paper and glass products while air consists of very dense smog.

  • Discover hidden stories about how pollution started

data.short_description: Let this first person exploration game take you to a waste covered island to fight pollution one garbage at a time. Team up with wild animals, discover hidden stories and defeat monster called pollution once and for all.
data.supported_languages: English, Czech, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 3230M @ 2.60GHz, 4 Cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GT 740M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700 @ 3.60GHz, 4 Cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
